question: 洞
sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: <reading>Hoe Ra</reading> (<ja>ほら</ja>), the version of Ra who carries a hoe around, is using said hoe to dig out a <vocabulary>cave</vocabulary> for himself, to provide shade from the sun (despite being the god of sun). He digs digs digs and then sits in his nice cave, hoe in hand.
